data.title: Wedding Midland
data.text: This hotel is awesome - people friendly - very attentive.  Bar is wonderful - great music - great service.  It was really nice.  Clean - just great.  Restaurant was great - the food was good for both dinner and breakfast.  Can't complain - again this was awesome.

data.title: Remembered my name and knew what room I was in without me telling them
data.text: Stayed there during a job that was nearby, hotel staff was the friendliest I've ever encountered and treated me like I was their number one priority. I will definitely be back to this location I the future.

data.title: Nice hotel downtown Midland
data.text: Quality accommodations downtown Midland.  Hotel offers free valet parking and has some other limited parking - new large parking garage is under construction.  This is an older building but it's a good thing - solid and quiet.  Nicely updated.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review, we are so very pleased that you enjoyed our location and time with us.  We take great pride in serving our guests and creating a relaxing environment.  We look forward to having you with us again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Business stay gone wrong
data.text:
This hotel seems very run down and staffed to levels that only keep the doors open.
This is by far my worst Hilton property stay ever.  If there was ever a time when I should get a free stay or mega bonus points this was the stay.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your invaluable input on helping us improve.  We take our Make it Right culture very seriously here.  You may have seen in our lobby that we proudly display our recently awarded CARE cup.  It is a designation that our staff all hold very closely with their pride.  I hope that our communications and resolutions with you have clearly exhibited that Make It Right is important to us.  Again, our thanks for taking time to share with us such important information.  Our obligation is to you, our client, and we hope you will call when next you need a stay in our city.  We would very much appreciate an opportunity to show you how we try to make every guest feel special.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good hotel in Midland
data.text: In for business for overnight. Good place, but can be updated. Doubletrees are usually very good and this place has most of their offerings, but sections of the hotel have a 80s feel. Two separate buildings and had to wait for a clean room after posted check in time.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review, we appreciate feedback from our guests.  I do apologize that you had to wait to check in.  With check out at Noon and check in at 3pm it's impossible to have every room ready.  I know it's an inconvenience and I'm sorry for that.  I do hope that we will have the opportunity to make this right for you in the very near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Relaxing night
data.text: The room was comfortable and quiet. We did not hear any neighbors or street noise. Very clean, with good consumer products available. Extra pillows and blankets offered as well as bottled water. Lighted makeup mirror was available. View overlooking the town square.  Easy parking available as well as valet. Had attended a play downtown and walked back to hotel in safe surroundings. Restaurant and Starbucks café inside of hotel.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your amazing review!  We love hearing from our guests.  I'm so glad you enjoyed the play and the walk back through downtown.   We look forward to your next visit to Midland.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Overnight stay
data.text: Quiet, recent Sunday night stay in Midland. Room was quite large, clean and comfortable. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Nice coffee bar in the lobby features Starbucks coffee and quick breakfast items to go or eat there. Parking is easily accessed and arrival is quick and simple with the large under cover entrance.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so glad that you enjoyed your time with us, and several of our amenities.  We look forward to your next visit to Midland :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: PBPA Meeting
data.text: I really enjoyed my stay and thought the hotel over all was excellent.  I was impressed by the coffee bar in the lobby.  I also liked the location of the hotel.  I woul have liked it to have express check out!

data.title: PBIOS Trip Lodging
data.text: I stay at the Doubletree every time I travel to my office in West Texas.  They are always extremely nice and helpful.  I can't wait until their new parking garage is finished, but until then I will continue to utilize their valet parking, which is very convenient.

data.title: best sleep and comfort
data.text: incredible bed and room comfort. great location for downtown business.  The staff were awesome upon arrival and the restaurant food was surprisingly delicious. After 6 hours of drive time i didn't want to drive to eat so i stayed in hotel.

data.title: Good motel at discounted price
data.text: Room is clean and quiet.  Not worth $400 per night but if you get the discounted rates of 200 it was probably worth that.  Motel downtown in business district and a ways from shopping and restaraunts. Motel restaurant overpriced and not worth it,  starting to show its age.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to post your review.  You mus have been in one of the suites for the rates you mentioned.  I truly hope that you enjoyed it!  We are downtown and away from the "strip" but we have some very good options for dining and entertainment within walking distance.  Please ask for tips from the desk staff, they are happy to share their favorites and provide directions!  We look forward to your return.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Business trip to Midland
data.text: I have stayed in this hotel a few times.  I highly recommend it, unless the PBA gets busy again and I can't find a room, then I recommend you stay somewhere else so I can stay here. I enjoy sitting in the reserve bar, first floor and having dinner while watching TV and conversation from the bar tender.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review!  We always enjoy having you with us and are looking forward to your next visit!  Thank you for your recommendation, that truly means the world to us.  We work very hard to care for our guests and it's always nice to be recognized.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Very nice facility
data.text: Very friendly staff and great food.  Love the cookies.  Thanks for a great stay and for working with our organization on the group billing.  If you are in Midland, then you should stay there. Bravo!!!!!!

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your review.  We are very happy that you enjoyed your time with us and look forward to your return.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Leaky Hotel
data.text: Would not stay again. The hotel had visible leaks and they were not doing anything to prevent water from puddling. The place probably has mold damage now.  The hotel staff did not know what kind of rooms they had available.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for letting us know that you had some issues during your stay.  We did unfortunately have a plumbing leak during the time you stayed.  We have had plumbers in to repair it and are in the process of repairing and cleaning any damage.  We have the utmost regard for the health and safety of our guests.  We do have new staff at the front desk and I apologize that they were unable to accommodate your requests, they are still learning.  I hope that you will return and provide us the opportunity to make this right for you.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Good stay
data.text: My SO and I had a very good stay here.  Minor disappointments were the view from our room, which was on the back side of the hotel, small bathroom, and value of the breakfast offering (I bought the package with vouchers).  The staff was very friendly and attentive and the room was very clean.  One plus for the tall people out there...the shower head was very high.  I am right at 6 feet tall and quite often I have to slouch in hotel showers but not this time.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for taking the time to post your review of our hotel.  We are very pleased you chose us to care for you during your travels and we look forward to the opportunity to do so in the future.  Check with the desk upon arrival and we can make sure you have a pool side view.  :)
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Honeymoon Suite
data.text: Excellent decor, felt like Las Vegas! Room service and in hotel dining very delicious menu. Private access to pool and fire pit was very nice also. Front desk staff, namely "Elizabeth" very nice and friendly!

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your excellent review, we are very happy that you enjoyed the suite.  It has many perks and amenities.  We will let Elizabeth know that you mentioned her.  She is pretty amazing and we are very blessed to have her on staff.  We hope that we will have the privilege of serving you again soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Summer Mummers stay
data.text: The Double Tree hotel in Downtown Midland was very clean and the staff was friendly.  We will definitely stay there again.  It was near the attractions we wanted to be close to, and there were several restaurants nearby.  Great Job!

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We look forward to your return!  Thanks for the excellent review!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great customer service
data.text: I arrived around 10:00 at night.  Check in was easy & quick. They have free valet or self parking but since I wasn't familiar with the area I chose valet.  It was a hassle only because I was in and out the next day about 6 times and spent a fortune on tips because the guy I asked about self parking wouldn't exactly point me in the right direction.  To their credit, they were very quick bringing my car.  I went to the front desk for toothpaste and a different time to break a $100 and they were friendly each time.  I kept seeing notices that we should be getting free cookies but I never got to partake in that.  I would definitely stay here again.  The rooms are clean althought the bathrooms could use an update.  It is close to restaurants and shopping. I never could get the internet to work on my kindle although it did work on my phone.  There are several small meeting places just in case you need to have a meeting. They have a small coffee shop but I didn't try it.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review!  You are thorough.  We are very glad that you enjoyed your time here with us.  Please make sure to try the cookies next time you are with us; in fact, ask for an extra! You missed out this last visit.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: First Time in Midland and I'm home because of The DoubleTree
data.text: I know that accommodations are temporary, but is still needs to allow for you to have some similitude of home. The DoubleTree in Midland did just THAT! They were very kind, gave us cookies, clean room, valet parking! What more can you ask for! The staff were always friendly and accomodating! Charles at the front desk was wonderful!

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your wonderful review!  We are so happy that you felt at home here, our staff works very hard to make this a home away from home for our guests.  I hope that you will be back to see us soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent experience at Doubletree in Midland Texas
data.text: This is a very high quality hotel with very courteous and customer friendly staff.  Great facilities.  Food was great.  Very comfortable place to stay. The staff went out of their way to make sure my needs were met and I was comfortable with the stay.  The rooms are very clean and comfortable.  Great place for business travel as well as Leisure.

owner_response.author: helen_futrell, Manager at DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Midland Plaza, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review of our hotel and staff.  We are so honored you chose us and would recommend us to others.  We look forward to seeing you again.
owner_response.title: Owner Response
